message.body: Hey there. I was gonna say Goodluck on your first day then remembered it was pushed back lol.
There's a free run event tomorrow night in the city. You wanna check it out?
Hahahah thanks for the sentiment nonetheless! I will pretend that you sent it from the future as a way to help me prepare :)
That's the spirit!
Oh cool. I'm babysitting tomorrow, what time is the run?
10 pm. Perfect for night owls.
Wait, it's at 10 pm?! Where?
Starts at perch pub. Couple blocks from my office
Where does it go to?
outside of Perch Pub at Broad and Locust at 10 p.m. Lyons and Allai
re will take runners on a three-mile fun run through the city, endi
he night off with a beer — Southern Tier will be on special — and s
ng at Misconduct Tavern (1511 Locust Street), where folks can cap t
ome conversation.
That was a confusing series of messages hahah.
In short, I'm inviting you to run around the city at 10 pm tomorrow heh
You up?
Hey.
What are you up to
Watching some late night television.
Can't sleep?
Pretty much.
Anything good on?
That's annoying.
Watching Seth Meyers.
I'm actually at Thuy's. I listened to her talk about her depressing thoughts until she passed out
Oh okay, are you staying over?
I'm not sure if I want to go or stay.
Don't you have work?
I don't want her to feel like I abandoned her when she wakes up or if she has another bad dream.
I do. Luckily I don't have to be in until around 10
So why don't you stay over then?
Sometimes I feel like I'm drowning a little. Her thoughts can be overwhelmingly hopeless but no one else has shown her enough understanding or patience.
I don't want her to feel alone because I know how that feels. It's pretty shitty.
It's very nice that you're there.
It's a difficult situation and patience is required.
It also helps that you could empathize.
Just remember to give yourself a break, you're doing what you can.
I know. Breaks my heart when I do and she says I know you're not ignoring me but you need a break. Because no one else listens
At least she understands.
Have to take it one day at a time.
You're a good friend, don't think otherwise.
Thank you. How was the rest of your tv watching?
Nothing mind blowing. Did you end up going home I staying?
*or
I stayed. I tried to convince her to see her therapist today then job hunt or research. She said what's the point then dismissed me to get ready for work.
What's on your plate for today?
I'm babysitting today. My sister has to run out and do a whole bunch of errands so I'm here for the day.
How's work?
Not bad. Just doing the usual. Waiting for my co-worker to get back from lunch so I can hit the gym
Have you given the run tonight any thought?
Yup. It depends on what time my sister gets back and how I'm feeling. How long does it last?
Maybe half hour? That's a decent pace for a non runner
Is it a short distance then?
The distance is 3 miles do that is almost on par with your 5k coming up
So*
Wait, three miles only take half an hour?!
Yeah... That's pretty slow. My non runner friend did it in 28 minutes.
I average 25 and below
Yea, I'm not that fast hahah.
Guess what I'm having for breakfast?￼
Hehe that's ok. I'll pace asking you if you show up. What a delightful breakfast!
Along*
Thanks! Hahah, I just finished the whole box...in one sitting...
Why does bacon taste so good?
I take only a few pieces a day haha. Because it's fat (flavor). The association with the sound of bacon cooking makes it that much more appealing. The crispy crunch is so welcoming. Etc...
I know. And the smell, it's like a drug. In fact, I here about a study a while back that the brain reacts to bacon as it would to cocaine.
That's scary!
I'll stick to the bacon.
I'm actually not even eating bacon right now. Was looking at pictures hahah. While eating Raisinettes!
I think you might have a problem =P
You call it a problem, I say eccentricity.
It was more of a joke about bacon having the same reaction as coke
Oh crap, my manager just texted me from Soundgarden. He said tomorrow. I wasn't expecting to work tomorrow.
Should I???
Ah. Depends if you wanna see Uyen
Tomorrow is Thursday.
She doesn't come back until Friday.
She's in tomorrow
I thought?
She told me Friday.
After work.
Until Sunday afternoon.
If you want that money heh
You think you'll go?
Penguin butt hehehe
So stickin' cute!!!
Doubly agreed :)
I forgot to pack my gummies to snack on :(
That's a bummer. Those Raisinettes helped a lot. Snacking is always nice.
Has that been your only source of fuel all day?
Yes, and water s
*water
Hmm. You need to be fed properly lol
In this room right now, I'm the one that is doing the feeding.
You go, mama bear
I'm hungry now.
Does your sister bring home food for you or cook?
My brother-in-law offered to make rice for me earlier, I wasn't hungry. My sister asks if I want anything from anyplace. I usually go for the Bambu hahah. I'm just feeling lazy to eat today.
I hate when I get lazy about eating. Always regret it the next morning when I wake up so voracious
Hahah. I know the feeling. Water usually helps.
Indeed. Gotta stay hydrated
Apparently, my legs are quite versatile.
Indeed they are lol. Bentley does the same to me
Did you just compare my nephew to a dog?
Not intentionally
I would imagine this is enough cause for you to use your claws on me
